mapper.sql:
JOIN `apartment_attribute` aa ON (aa.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND aa.`attribute_type_id` = ${apartmentNameAT} AND aa.`object_id` = a.`object_id`) JOIN `apartment_string_culture` ap_name ON (ap_name.`id` = aa.`value_id`)
LEFT JOIN `apartment_string_culture` ap_sort_name ON (ap_sort_name.`id` = aa.`value_id` AND ap_sort_name.`locale_id` = #{sortLocaleId})

JOIN `room_attribute` ra ON (ra.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND ra.`attribute_type_id` = ${roomNameAT} AND ra.`object_id` = r.`object_id`) JOIN `room_string_culture` room_name ON (room_name.`id` = ra.`value_id`)
LEFT JOIN `room_string_culture` room_sort_name ON (room_sort_name.`id` = ra.`value_id` AND room_sort_name.`locale_id` = #{sortLocaleId})
